languages.text: {n}Мужчина внимательно осматривает вас сверху вниз.{/n} "Да, я понял... Понял главное: ты — очень важная персона. {mf|Тот|Та}, чье появление может переломить ход событий. Это даже больше, чем я рассчитывал".

{n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина внимательно осматривает вас сверху вниз.{/n} "Да, я понял... Понял главное: ты — очень важная персона. {mf|Тот|Та}, чье появление может переломить ход событий. Это даже больше, чем я рассчитывал".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I get it... I get the important part, you are a very important person. Someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

{n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I get it... I get the important part: you are a very important person, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

{n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I get it... I get the important part: you are a very important person, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

{n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

{n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

languages.text: {n}Der Mann mustert dich von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n} "Ja, ich verstehe ... Ich erkenne die Krux der Angelegenheit. Ihr seid eine sehr wichtige Person, deren Ankunft das Blatt wenden kann. Das ist sogar noch mehr, als ich erwartet hatte."
languages.original_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann mustert dich von Kopf bis Fuß.{/n} "Ja, ich verstehe ... Ich erkenne die Krux der Angelegenheit. Ihr seid eine sehr wichtige Person, deren Ankunft das Blatt wenden kann. Das ist sogar noch mehr, als ich erwartet hatte."

languages.text: {n}L'homme vous toise des pieds à la tête.{/n} « Oui, je vois... Je vois ce que cela signifie : vous êtes quelqu'un de très important, quelqu'un dont l'arrivée est à même de changer la donne. Je n'en attendais pas tant. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme vous toise des pieds à la tête.{/n} « Oui, je vois... Je vois ce que cela signifie : vous êtes quelqu'un de très important, quelqu'un dont l'arrivée est à même de changer la donne. Je n'en attendais pas tant. »

languages.text: {n}眼前的男人把你从头到脚仔细打量了一遍。{/n}“我明白了……我看到了问题的关键。你是个非常重要的人，你的身份足以扭转局势，这甚至超出了我的预期。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的男人把你从头到脚仔细打量了一遍。{/n}“我明白了……我看到了问题的关键。你是个非常重要的人，你的身份足以扭转局势，这甚至超出了我的预期。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre te mira de la cabeza a los pies.{/n} «Sí, ya veo... Veo que es un pez gordo, alguien cuya llegada puede cambiar las tornas. Esto es más de lo que esperaba».
languages.original_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre te mira de la cabeza a los pies.{/n} «Sí, ya veo... Veo que es un pez gordo, alguien cuya llegada puede cambiar las tornas. Esto es más de lo que esperaba».

languages.text: {n}男はあなたを頭の先から足の先までじっと見つめた。{/n}「なるほどな…問題の本質がわかったよ。お前は相当な重要人物で、ここに来たことで流れを変えられるってわけだ。思ってたよりずっとすごいな」
languages.original_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."

traits.locale_text: {n}男はあなたを頭の先から足の先までじっと見つめた。{/n}「なるほどな…問題の本質がわかったよ。お前は相当な重要人物で、ここに来たことで流れを変えられるってわけだ。思ってたよりずっとすごいな」

languages.text: {n}Adam seni tepeden tırnağa inceliyor.{/n} "Evet... Meselenin özünü anlıyorum. Çok önemli, hatta gelişiyle her şeyi değiştirebilecek birisiniz. Böylesini beklemiyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}The man scrutinises you from top to bottom.{/n} "Yes, I see... I see the crux of the matter: you are someone very important, someone whose arrival can turn the tide. This is even more than I expected."
